Clinical Effect: Women with severe IBS with diarrhea
Adverse Effect: 不能連續使用, 30%會便秘, 0.3%腸道缺血
半衰期長,需隔4週以上才能改用MAOI (synergistic effect)
半衰期短, 太快停藥造成一週dizziness

Clinical Effect: Serotonin + MAOI → Serotonin syndrome (感心興吐焦慮體溫過高失眠腸胃血壓, 大多了時要用benzodiazepine跟blocker支持性療法)

Adverse Effect: Coronary vasospasm (contraindication for coronary diseases, 心絞痛) Sumatriptan: oral, injection, nasal spray (IV太強效)
